summary: All three requirements are implemented in the diff. REQ-1 is addressed in backend/main.mo with a deleteHabit function. REQ-2 is addressed in HabitCard.tsx with native pointer/touch event handling for swipe-left gesture. REQ-3 is addressed in useQueries.ts with the useDeleteHabit mutation hook. One minor gap exists: the backend truncation prevents full verification of ok/err variant return type.

missing_requirements.requirement: Returns an ok/err variant indicating success or failure.
missing_requirements.reason: The backend/main.mo file is truncated and the deleteHabit function body is not visible in the diff. We cannot confirm it returns an ok/err variant. The frontend calls actor.deleteHabit(habitId) without variant unwrapping, suggesting it may return a simple value rather than an ok/err variant.
